column5: Fill up your car, boat and jerry cans, gas is going up tonight to over a dollar fourty...
You really should read a few of the other threads before posting.
Quick, go get it while it's a steal!  If my tank was bone dry, it would make less than a 4 dollar difference for me
70 litre fill you'll save $2.80.  So hurry up, go wait in line idling for an hour!!!   People crack me up.
You should have hoarded gas in December 2008, much better deal.
That's pretty funny to watch people bent out of shape and line up at the pumps so they can save a couple of $$ on a full tank of gas Then they go inside and buy a 500ml bottle of water for $1.49

I use to almost fill the '69 Bee's tank for that $2.80 Bill.. with nice red leaded premium! That said.. I always get a good chuckle when there's a 10 minute back up on the CTC pumps at $127.7 and nobody is slowing me down across the street at Zehrs for $127.9 !
what a world, put over $150 in the truck a few days back. Absolutely criminal
Even if Gas goes to $ 2.00 a liter....I mean really who cares !!!

Sorry roy, I was on the mobile version and did a scan and didn't see anything, when I got home I saw the other thread... On the mobile version the second line of the posts don't show up. "Here we go again" is not very descriptive....  Anyway when I filled up the jeep from a 1/4 tank it took 70 to fill. Better than waiting to friday and putting in 75 or 80. Why give them more if I don't have to?  Funny thing is I moved to the city to cut down on the commute, I went from 1000km's a week just to work and back 5 days a week to 80km's a week. 8km's one way. I decided in the summer would try riding the bike to work, I am a bit hesitant due to the fear of getting flattened by a driver, but I think the gas price change will motivate me to make the change....at least for one day.
Lowest price in the province is 5 minutes from home at $1.14. And I get another 20 cents or so off of that price.
well said Kipawa Jim! absolute crap! I drive about 5000kms a month for work. The oil companies are making billions in profits!
